title: Really confused at how Riot thinks jungle EXP is okay
body:
Just watched a Jarvan do nothing but camp top and mid after double buffs, and he somehow kept up with both solo lanes in EXP.

What the fuck is this?

replies.body: Yup, pretty balanced exp mkay, 200 cs 0/0/0 jungle {{champion:203}}  is lower lvl than duo top lane that both have 5 kills and 5 assists with 40 minions, but hey at least it isn't as bad as support exp being completely negligible where you're always like 2-4 lvls below the midlaner apparently.

> [{quoted}](name=Peritheus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ceKgnc8R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T08:04:23.680+0000)
>
> Yup, pretty balanced exp mkay, 200 cs 0/0/0 jungle {{champion:203}}  is lower lvl than duo top lane that both have 5 kills and 5 assists with 40 minions, but hey at least it isn't as bad as support exp being completely negligible where you're always like 2-4 lvls below the midlaner apparently.

last season in lcs supports were lvl 7-8 while laners were 12-13 lvl supps were like walking bags of gold rofl now it's a bit better tho.
xd yeah, those support items are so dirty dirt cheap{{item:3504}} {{item:3107}} {{item:3301}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2055}}  but hey at least the game ends at 20 ish mins.
